name: workie-backend
description: Backend API for Workie.lk - Job marketplace platform

scripts.logs: type logs\app.log 2>nul || cat logs/app.log 2>/dev/null || echo No logs found
scripts.logs:error: type logs\error.log 2>nul || cat logs/error.log 2>/dev/null || echo No error logs found
scripts.logs:crash: type logs\crashes.log 2>nul || cat logs/crashes.log 2>/dev/null || echo No crash logs found
scripts.clean:logs: if exist logs rmdir /s /q logs && mkdir logs || rm -rf logs && mkdir logs
scripts.health: curl http://localhost:5000/api/health || echo Health check failed

author: Workie.lk Team
